ThingDef.label: Combat Knife
ThingDef.description: Perfectly balanced and can cause severe hemorrhaging. It weighs almost nothing.

ThingDef.label: Machete "VTX"
ThingDef.description: A Savage classic, forged from 100 years of conflict. Now enhanced with vibro-technology.

ThingDef.label: Stun Baton
ThingDef.description: Struck victims spasm helplessly, which tends to only provoke further beating by attacker.

ThingDef.label: P2 Compact
ThingDef.description: High-caliber sidearm deployed since the first contact with the Strain. Modified for CQC. Features an extended magazine and a laser pointer for reflexive firing.

ThingDef.label: Shotgun "Chucky"
ThingDef.description: A shotgun used by the first-encounter killteams during the Neptune Incident.

ThingDef.label: Shotgun "Stumpy"
ThingDef.description: A shortened version mainly used as a sidearm. Its spread is ideal for close encounters.

ThingDef.label: Shotgun "Outranger"
ThingDef.description: An extended variant that is often deployed against hardened targets with AP-slugs.

ThingDef.label: SAP-1
ThingDef.description: The SAP-1 gained notoriety by punks in the Urbworld and Megacolonies for its high rate of fire and knockback.

ThingDef.label: SAP "Convoy"
ThingDef.description: Adored by vehicle crews who hate to reload, this ultracompact version has twice the ammo.

ThingDef.label: SAP-SOPMOD
ThingDef.description: This sleek special-ops conversion increases the SAP's accuracy and damage output.

ThingDef.label: LCR
ThingDef.description: The LCR is essenstially a cut-down MAR. Trading range, firepower and handling for portability.

ThingDef.label: LCR "Bandit"
ThingDef.description: The LCR Bandit variant sports a large drum mag and a micro-laser module.

ThingDef.label: LCR-E
ThingDef.description: The extended range L4 has a long reinforced barrel mod, angled foregrip and magnified optics.

ThingDef.label: MAR
ThingDef.description: The reliable, mass-produced Main Assault Rifle has been in service since the First Outbreak.

ThingDef.label: MAR-C "Pyrate"
ThingDef.description: This folded-up setup has a drum mag and reinforced barrel for prolonged firing. Yarrr!

ThingDef.label: MAR4 DMR
ThingDef.description: The Designated Marksman variant trades portability for greater range.

ThingDef.label: Heavy Battle Rifle
ThingDef.description: A long-ranged, hard-hitting, semi-automatic cousin of the MAR4 with high velocity ammo.

ThingDef.label: HMG60-SAW
ThingDef.description: The oppressive Squad Assault Weapon brings a wicked grin to those that wield it "Wolfen" style.

ThingDef.label: HAMR 20mm "Monster Killer"
ThingDef.description: This beast fires a 20mm shell that can tear through flesh and materiel. Handle with care.

ThingDef.label: Tactical Minigun "Gatty"
ThingDef.description: The "Gatty" is a converted air-assault rotary cannon with a terrifying rate of fire.

ThingDef.label: RPG Launcher
ThingDef.description: A versatile High-explosive Incendiary Armor Piercing RPG launcher. A multiple use alternative to single-shot launchers.

ThingDef.label: Flamethrower
ThingDef.description: A terrifying weapon, used for setting up fiery killzones. Extremely effective against the Strain.

ThingDef.label: P2X
ThingDef.description: An experimental pistol, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. A favorite among WhiteCell operators.

ThingDef.label: Shotgun "Blaster"
ThingDef.description: An experimental shotgun, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. Another favorite among WhiteCell operators due to their preference for close combat.

ThingDef.label: XMAR
ThingDef.description: An experimental MAR, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. Barely different from its mass-produced counterpart, owing to the fact that its one of the first weapons modified when the Mechanoids were also getting infested by the Strain.

ThingDef.label: XHMG60-SAW
ThingDef.description: An experimental Machinegun, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. A heavy weapon capable of putting down armored variants of the Strain with ease, its effective whether the target is mechanical or fleshy in nature.

ThingDef.label: XAMR 12mm "Hunter Killer"
ThingDef.description: An experimental anti-materiel rifle, firing pulse charged munitions that gets charged as it leaves the barrel. Modified to fire 12x72mm charged munitions, this beast can tear a hole through anything it hits.

ThingDef.label: Railgun "Eraser"
ThingDef.description: A fearsome railgun. A weapon deployed for experimental weapon platforms. Each round is capable of tearing through anything it hits. It uses electromagnetic technology to propel each one of its shells to hypersonic speeds.
